publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1355 Fiona Hyslop: Housing Stock Transfer-That the Parliament notes that the ballot for the proposed Glasgow housing stock transfer may now be delayed until late 2001; calls upon the Scottish Executive to abandon its wholesale stock transfer policy in its current review of problem policies, and further calls upon the Executive to release budgets allocated for stock transfer now in order to improve housing stock in Glasgow and throughout Scotland. Supported by: Bruce Crawford*, Nicola Sturgeon*, Shona Robison*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Michael Russell*, Tricia Marwick*
S1M-1355 Housing Stock Transfer (lodged on 14 November 2000) Fiona McLeod*
